channel.title: A couple noob questions. >.<
channel.description:
hmm...i am using a delta base and i am wondering how can i change the prices of items in the shops?
i got a couple questions, sorry guys.
2. how can i move the shops on delta's? 3.how do i change tele co-ords? and last..how can i move the npc's?
wow...i havent coded any deltas...so...ya....any help appreciated. :)
and it's texthandler or something to change like the bank name?

item.title: A couple noob questions. >.<
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  1. Item configuration file.
  2. Autospawn configuration file.
  3. clickingMost class.
  4. Autospawn configuration file.

Read full topic
